Description.Name: Scott Cooper
Description.Details: Scott "Kestrel" Cooper is a seasoned MechWarrior with a turbulent past. Born on the war-torn planet of Solaris VII, he witnessed the devastating consequences of interstellar conflicts at a young age. Despite losing his family to a brutal raid by pirates, Scott found purpose within the cockpit of a BattleMech. He is a skilled technician and is often found in the mechbay working with the mechtechs to squeeze every last drop of performance from his loadouts
